message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take $60, you get $40.
Your offer was too low, Alice. Let's be more realistic. I propose 70/30.
I understand you want a larger share, but my previous offer is my bottom line. I can go up to $55 for you, but that's my final offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Take the 40 while it's still worth something to you.
